alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 12 at 7:01AM MDT until June 15 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pueblo CO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River NEAR Avondale affecting Pueblo County. .Recent heavy rainfall on Fountain Creek will likely put the Arkansas River near Avondale above flood stage. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Pueblo, Avondale, Nepesta, Fowler, Rocky Ford, La Junta, Lamar...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River NEAR Avondale. * WHEN...From this evening to Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Moderate Flood * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM MDT Monday the stage was 6.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 7.9 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.9 feet on 07/20/1969. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 700 PM MDT.
